GSD.product_version: versions from v4.8 to before v5.4.153
GSD.description:
i2c: acpi: fix resource leak in reconfiguration device addition

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.153 by commit 60bacf259e8c2eb2324f3e13275200baaee9494b, it was introduced in version v4.8 by commit 525e6fabeae286848592363bda13bc34b59bb5ac. For more details please see the references link.
